title: Best of The Herd: 12/31/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/31/2018
description:
Colin says loud teams don't win in the NFL and that’s why a team like the Steelers that is great on offense and defense missed out on the playoffs. He says to use your eyeballs not a stat-sheet when looking at Dak Prescott. Plus, former NFL WR TJ Houshmandzadeh talks about the disappointment in Kirk Cousins and why the Browns coaching vacancy is the best one available. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
